name: Neon Arena (itch)
description:
A (very unfinished) Game for the MiniJam 58 

Theme: Neon
Limitation: Money must be a core mechanic

So for some Reason i decided that the firt GameJam in a while and one of the first ones I'm participating in alone is the perfect opportunity to create an enemy AI that has to do more then just follow the player. IT WASN'T.

How the Game works:

You get money every 10 Seconds you can increase the amount of the Money you get through Upgrades and by capturing "Towers". The goal is to gather as much money as possible, after 5 Minutes the game ends and the player with the most money wins. You can upgrade your base/personal Stats by pressing "e" near you base or the stats of your towers (also press "e" close to a tower that you've captured). You can kill enemys or their core, killing the player will respawn him in his base(no other penaltys for dying have been implemented yet). Destoying their core will stop their moneygeneration (Towers excluded) until the core is restored. Restoring cores and capturing towers works the same, just stand in them and if the circle arround them starts to change color you're capturing it.

Oh yeah by the bay the ugly number on the bottom left are the health and ammo.

Some Infos about the Upgrades:

There are two upgrades that do not do anything yet:
The Guard upgrade in the Base nad the notify upgrade in the tower DON'T BUY THEM YOUR JUST GONNA WASTE YOUR MONEY

What the other Upgrades do:

Base:

Money + : increases the Money you get per intervall
Money -: decreases the intervall time between recieveing Money(includes Towers)
Health +: Increase you maximum Health
Weapons: if you dont already own the weapon you will get it if you already own it, it will do more damage(if you bought a weapon once you can always get it back for free even if the price sais something else)

Tower:
Money +: Increases the money you get form this specific tower
Turret: your tower turns into a turret and shoots enemies 
Time up: it takes longer for enemies to steal your base

(all of these upgrade get lost one you'r base is gets captures by an enemy)

Controlls:

W,A,S,D/Arrows : move

LMB : shoot

E: open the shop
